title: Silent Hill Complete Discography + Fan Music
description:
Every Silent Hill song I could find to date, including Silent Hill 1-4, Origins (Zero), Homecoming, Shatter Memories, Downpour, The Arcade game, the Play Novel, and both movies.

Also includes unreleased music for all these things, and remixes and remasters by Akira himself.

There is likely a large amount of dupes in the various folders, as all the songs are from other torrents, or from Silent Hill Memories, and I was to lazy to check each song against each other to see if they were the same.

As for the fan music, it's generally close to the Silent Hill music feel from what I can tell thus far.

I've also included the Silent Hill inspired music from Renard Queenston under fan music, and i'm pointing this out because I would actually argue some of the songs would be better fits for the games than the official songs at times, so check those ones out.


*********************************************************************************

If you take the time to check through everything, and find something i'm missing, leave a comment with the title or a link to the song, and i'll add it in.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Last thing, if you like this kind of music, I have some recommendations.

First off the Cryo Chamber label, full of dark/industrial ambient music, sometimes with a movie music like quality to it.

Second, Aurastys, one of Renard Queenstons alias, this one more focused on ambient/industrial type stuff.

That's all I got for now.
